entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error en Shell Flyout #12587
  • CollectionView inside a Grid, various problems #12584
  • MAUI: border not clip image #12580
    Backlog
  • Graphics view gets cropped while zoom out by scaling. #12569
    Backlog
  • Carousel View does not behave properly in Windows #12567
    Backlog
  • Unable to add an event handler via XAML if the event is internal #12566
  • CustomShellRenderer to change the color of navbar to a linear gradient #12563
    Backlog

Closed

  • Shell Navigation in OnAppearing Causes Fault on Windows #12313
  • Can't use Entity Framework Core in iOS Release builds #12537
  • Invalid bundle on iOS uploading to store #12565
  • CarouselView Shows All Items at Once in Windows #7180
    Backlog
  • has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #12581
  • .NET Maui first Hello World for .Net 7.0 Windows target fails #12186
  • Heading not read out by screenreader on Android #12540
    Backlog
  • Transparent background support in (blazor)webview component #12534
  • Adding mappings to ViewHandler.Mapper only works if you run it before calling MauiApp.CreateBuilder() #11853
    Backlog
  • ContainerView processing currently isn't consistent between platforms and needs to happen through the mapper #12583
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Win UI] Slider throws an exception when trying to move the thumb #12405
    Backlog
  • Blazor Web integration with MAUI / RCL / MAUI Class Library #12489
  • CustomShellRenderer to change the color of navbar to a linear gradient #12307

PullRequests

Created

  • Internalize MessagingCenter #12582
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove obsoleted OpenGLView #12579
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Align Graphics APIs naming with the rest of the platforms #12578
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix net8 TODOs in code #12577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12576
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12575
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12574
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12573
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12572
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12571
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12570
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix shapes and maps types collisions on XAML #12568
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, area/Xaml </>, area/Maps🗺
  • added monochrome element to the AdaptiveIconDrawableXml #12564
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix missing stub interface #12586
  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • Update Essentials VersionTracking API Docs #12528
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #11907
  • Process ContainerView through mapper and fix NeedsContainer logic #12260
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12561
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix Slider crash using the same Minimum, Maximum value #12514
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [net7.0] Use older versions to match msbuild in VS #12472
    area/single project ☝️
  • Fix MenuFlyoutSubItemHandler to actually call MapIsEnabled #12562
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen

Updated

  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add more logging for BlazorWebView #12357
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Propagate VisualElement.IsEnabled to children #12488
  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Enable nullable on Controls.Core #12555
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
